opponent.label: Ms. Fortune
opponent.description: Nadia Fortune is the last surviving member of the Fishbone Gang. A failed attempt to steal the mysterious Life Gem from Lorenzo Medici resulted in their grisly deaths. Before meeting her own doom, Ms. Fortune swallowed the Life Gem and managed to digest it. The Gem’s power permeated her entire body, making it truly undying… even after being cut into several pieces.
